LanguageData.PsychicInsanityLance.label: psychic insanity lance
LanguageData.PsychicInsanityLance.description: One-use artifact that drives any character into a berserk state from any distance - even through walls.
LanguageData.PsychicShockLance.label: psychic shock lance
LanguageData.PsychicShockLance.description: One-use artifact that directs psychic disturbances towards one character, dropping them into a state of psychic shock for some time. Large risk of brain damage.
LanguageData.PsychicAnimalPulser.label: psychic animal pulser
LanguageData.PsychicAnimalPulser.description: One-use artifact that drives all animals in the region into a manhunting rage.
LanguageData.PsychicSoothePulser.label: psychic soothe pulser
LanguageData.PsychicSoothePulser.description: One-use artifact which gives a temporary mood boost to everyone on the map.
